issue.title: Boxes are too far apart in qual_task_1.world

content.raw:
This reminds me of one of those old school games where you had to solve a puzzle to unlock the path, just without the puzzle.

Well, the only benefit of making quals more difficult would be for the government to save a little money (less vrc practise and vrc cloud time that has to be paid for), but has no effect on the actual competition.

This reminds me of one of those old school games where you had to solve a puzzle to unlock the path, just without the puzzle.

Well, the only benefit of making quals more difficult would be for the government to save a little money (less vrc practise and vrc cloud time that has to be paid for), but has no effect on the actual competition.
